html:
5.16.17  10:22 pm   where is that little sound byte saying "stolen" from?

     history of the entire world, i guess

     it was in your vid and i feel like i've heard it somewhere.

     i recorded it for the video

5.16.17  10:19 pm   Do you like bees?

     they are ok

5.16.17  10:09 pm   If you could write a book, what would it be called?

     it depends on the contents of the book

5.16.17  10:00 pm   What's your favorite season?

     the new one

5.16.17  9:56 pm   When you won the Shorty Award last year, why didn't you mention anything besides "Thank you?" For whom was the thanks? Did you not want to thank anyone specific? Or was it a finger to the awards system?

     i was thanking whomever gave me the award. which i think in the case of the shorty awards is a combination of judges and online voting? i'm not too sure

5.16.17  9:32 pm   you seem to have an impressive work ethic judging from your previous responses to questions concerning your time spent in making hotewig and how you wanted to take on a challenge. how do you keep up that drive to work and wanting to do new things?

     i don't usually have to try to want stuff. that happens automatically, and then i have to figure out what the hell i can do about it

5.16.17  9:13 pm   do you have a social life? your answers seem to indicate that you spend all of your time working. do you see friends, have an SO, meet with family etc?

     mostly no

5.16.17  9:08 pm   i made a hole in my oven. did i follow the manual properly?

     it depends whether that was in the manual

5.16.17  8:59 pm   how much is too much

     anything more than the correct amount

5.16.17  8:51 pm   Does Canada actually exist?

     oh hell yeah
5.16.17  8:45 pm   How long did it take to make "history of the entire world, i guess"

5.16.17  8:41 pm   Do you think your channel will become more known since people are reacting to your vids more?

     my channel has been becoming steadily more known, over time

5.16.17  8:40 pm   is that circle with a green line supposed to be the Earth in the HOTEWIG thumbnail?

     it's supposed to be the entire world, i guess

5.16.17  8:38 pm   Hey Bill, is your car still bad?

     it's worse

5.16.17  8:33 pm   Love appears to be a theme that commonly occurs in much of your work. Is there a reason for that?

     it's nice

5.16.17  8:09 pm   how come HoTEWIG is all in caps but o isnt? i know it's 'of' but it feels like discrimination

     that's just the way you decided to write it, i guess

5.16.17  7:53 pm   do you plan on making videos more often?

     i have already been making them constantly, non-stop, as fast as i can, since 2014

5.16.17  7:32 pm   do you like to use long words to make yourself sound more photosynthesis?

     absolutely not

5.16.17  7:31 pm   Hey dude, any tips for preparing for a test? -Zach

     try to figure out what the questions are going to be. wait nevermind, try to figure out what the answers are going to be

5.16.17  7:23 pm   whens the last time you contemplated your life

     i'm doing it right now
5.16.17  7:20 pm   What are your favourite movies?

5.16.17  7:19 pm   can you be a teacher

     i will leave it up to others to decide if i have taught them something

5.16.17  7:09 pm   Could I know more about you

     sure

5.16.17  7:07 pm   how do i get comfortable with doing my own thing instead of what people wouldn't judge me for doing?

     develop a force field
5.16.17  7:06 pm   how many of hours sleep do you get per night
5.16.17  7:03 pm   make the umbrella your favicon

5.16.17  7:01 pm   was History your favorite school subject?

     absolutely not

5.16.17  6:48 pm   please give me an advice on improving piano technique

     spend more time at the piano! enjoying it, finding new ways to enjoy it. if it is not enjoyable then i would not recommend doing it

5.16.17  6:36 pm   do you find history of poland interesting?

     oh hell yeah

5.16.17  6:29 pm   What's the end of pi?

     3

5.16.17  6:29 pm   Do you have a life?

     yes

5.16.17  6:29 pm   How many of the same questions do you get?

     2
5.16.17  6:19 pm   whats your mbti personality

5.16.17  5:54 pm   How can you keep answering the ueqstions non-stop?

     i do not

      Or are the timestamps just when the ueqstions were added? Or do you just?

     the time stamp is when the question was asked
5.16.17  5:50 pm   bill wurtz you are the very coolest. what made you this way
5.16.17  5:49 pm   do you like memes. if so then what's your favorite meme? mind is fres shavado (fresh avacado)

5.16.17  5:36 pm   how to buy an invisible drum set

     i don't think they exist
5.16.17  5:24 pm   he bill where do you get all of your sound effects and music (also i'm guessing you use sony vegas?)

5.16.17  5:17 pm   Have you ever heard about that one cool country called Croatia? I'm just wondering.

     yes

5.16.17  5:05 pm   Why are the dates on the anagram page the same color as the page itself?

     because i don't want them to be a part of the page design, but i want them to be readily available, like for example, to prove that i wasn't doing john mccain anagrams in 2016

5.16.17  4:46 pm   There's a Patreon going around online for you. Is it really yours? I've seen Patreon scams before and just want to be sure.

     i'm not sure. but mine is this one

5.16.17  4:19 pm   what do you have against capital letters

     nothing
5.16.17  4:19 pm   Lmao what now? I love the new video you pulled out of your magic hat of creativity and effort but my negro, what's next?

5.16.17  4:08 pm   do you pronounce GIF with a hard G or a soft G

     usually neither

5.16.17  3:53 pm   Are you going to start uploading more?

     i am already uploading projects immediately after they are complete, and completing them as fast as possible. i have been doing this for many years. it would be impossible to do it any faster

5.16.17  3:49 pm   why did you leave out the history of plaid in your video you monster

      the reason i didn't mention everything in that video is because the video was not long enough to mention everything

5.16.17  3:42 pm   how do you auto tune your voice?

     using my voice muscles

5.16.17  3:40 pm   What's the word of the day?

     i like to use multiple words per day

5.16.17  3:34 pm   What happened to your really old videos? Like the ones from the 70s

     i did not make any videos in the 70s

5.16.17  3:13 pm   have u ever wondered why the caps lock key don't work on the numbers or other punctuation marks/

     yes but i figured it out
